text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Ben Ali to deliver speech in Carthage Palace on occasion of Sport and Olympic Spirit Day.
- Tourism Mediterranean congress to be organised by chambers of commerce of Marseille, Tunis and Barcelona in Tunisia in March 1998.
- Visiting South African Deputy President Mbeki has talks with Tunisian ministers of foreign affairs, trade and environment on increasing cooperation.
- Tunisia, Lebanon sign accord on cooperation in professional training.
- Tunisia, South Africa sign air transport accord setting legal framework for flights between the two countries.
- Parliament's sub-committees continue discussion of ninth development plan 1997-2001.
- Tunisian businesswomen's group visits French city of Lyon this week to promote partnership.
- Tunisia has 6,500 scientific researchers in 26 centres.
